name: Robot Rewind (BreadAndJam)
description:
This game was made for Brackey's Jam 2020-2

The theme is incorporated by having to hold the space bar to rewind your robot's power.

A top down shooter where you have to defend your AI - housed in an AI container. Pick up power-ups and rewind your robot up to keep its power high.

Controls: use WASD to move and the mouse to aim. There is a HUD in the top right corner showing you (green) the enemies (red) and power-up spawn points (blue).

Keep an eye on your power bar bottom left, hold space to rewind your robot's power. Note that you cannot move or shoot while holding space. The middle bar is your health and the right bar is the health of your AI container. Note you can damage the AI container with your bullets.

Power-ups will spawn on the power-up points every 60 seconds.

Survive for as long as you can - a timer is counting top left.
